text: Klays Jisas adɨkɨd ownɨgab ñɨn ak, binɨb okok kɨlop kod yenɨgab. Pen binɨb koŋɨm yenɨgabal okok sek, kumɨlak okok sek bɨlok keke lɨnɨgab. Anɨb ak nɨm, takaw agɨnɨgebin anɨb awl, anɨb anɨb gɨnɨmɨn agɨnɨgebin ak, yokɨp ma agebin. God ayɨp Jisas ayɨp nɨg mɨdeleknɨŋ, nad anɨgɨl gɨnɨmɨn agɨl agñebin.
